messages.message:
@Ashish Update on `instabase-build`:
• GKE resources are all :poof: 
• Set :fire: to all but one GCS bucket
• Added :broom: cleanup rules to GAR to purge anything that managed to be untagged and/or over 1 year old
• Custom :black_circle: turned loose against all compute instances, disks, snapshots, etc. _except_ for some Aqua snapshots that i wasn't entirely sure were safe to delete CC:@jayapandian.ponraj @sudeep

@Ashish Update on `instabase-dev`:
• Dropped instances, snapshots, disks, etc. from compute
• There are some GCS buckets I don't know anything about so I didn't mess with them, but I suspect they're largely useless
• No GKE resources left there
• GAR has lots of data stuffed in there but if the project is to be dropped, that's fine
